markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Diamond Dust](/Spells.aspx?ID=2380)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 263

**Domain**
[Cold](/Domains.aspx?ID=103)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot [emanation](/Rules.aspx?ID=2387)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) fortitude

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You supercool the nearby air, forming a cloud of dancing ice crystals in an emanation around you. A creature other than you that enters the area or ends its turn within the area takes 2d6 [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. The crystals scatter and refract light; if a light effect enters diamond dust’s area, any creatures targeted by that effect gain a +2 status bonus to AC and saves against it. While the spell persists, you can activate or deactivate this aura by [Sustaining](/Actions.aspx?ID=2317) the spell. You can [Dismiss](/Actions.aspx?ID=2311) this spell.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d6.
name: Diamond Dust

A creature other than you that enters the area or ends its turn within the area takes 2d6 cold damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. The crystals scatter and refract light; if a light effect enters diamond dust’s area, any creatures targeted by that effect gain a +2 status bonus to AC and saves against it. While the spell persists, you can activate or deactivate this aura by Sustaining the spell. You can Dismiss this spell. --- Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.
